body.p:
463
May 23d 4
Gen. L. Thomas
Adjutant Genl U. S. A.
Washington, D. C
General,

I am instructed by the Governor to request that Private John P. Watts Com. A. 10th Ky Infy be discharged to enable him to accept a Commission tendered him as 2nd Lieut. Comp. E mounted. Infy Vols. There are sufficient number of men in said Comp E to entitle said Watts to a command

Respy.
Your. obed. Sevt
John Boyle
Adj. Genl. of Ky
